scripts.install:all:npm: npm install && npm install --prefix=shared/database && npm install --prefix=shared/types && npm install --prefix=shared/utils && npm install --prefix=services/config-service && npm install --prefix=services/operator-interface-service && npm install --prefix=services/shipping-service && npm install --prefix=services/stock-integration-service && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate
scripts.build:shared: pnpm -C shared/database build && pnpm -C shared/types build && pnpm -C shared/utils build
scripts.build:services: pnpm -C services/config-service build && pnpm -C services/operator-interface-service build && pnpm -C services/shipping-service build && pnpm -C services/stock-integration-service build
scripts.build: pnpm run build:shared && pnpm run build:services
scripts.start:all: concurrently "pnpm run start:config" "pnpm run start:stock" "pnpm run start:shipping" "pnpm run start:operator"
scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run start:dev:config" "pnpm run start:dev:stock" "pnpm run start:dev:shipping" "pnpm run start:dev:operator"
